# Setup

```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tuneR)
library(glue)
library(here)
library(h2o)
library(furrr)

h2o.init(nthreads = -1)

h2o.no_progress()  # Disable progress bars for Rmd



```


# Analysis

```{r}
train_map <- read.csv('Train.csv')
test_map <- read.csv('Test.csv')

# tst <- readMP3(filename = paste0('Train/',"0009FW",'.mp3'))

tbl_mp3 <- list.files(path = 'Train/',full.names = F,recursive = T) %>% 
  enframe(name = NULL) %>% 
  rename(ID=value) %>% 
  mutate(ID = gsub(x = ID,pattern = '.mp3',replacement = "")) %>% 
  left_join(train_map,by = "ID") %>% 
  mutate(data = ID %>% future_map(wave2mat)) %>% 
  rename()




 ```
